products.name: PlayStation 5 Digital Edition
products.description: Experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, and 3D Audio.

specifications.CPU: AMD Zen 2-based CPU with 8 cores at 3.5GHz

features.title: DualSense Controller
features.description: Experience gaming with innovative haptic feedback and dynamic trigger effects.

features.title: 3D Audio
features.description: Immerse yourself in soundscapes where you can hear individual raindrops.

features.title: Ray Tracing
features.description: Ray tracing delivers realistic lighting and shadows in supported games.

products.name: Xbox Series X
products.description: The fastest, most powerful Xbox ever. Play thousands of titles across four generations of consoles with backward compatibility.

features.title: Velocity Architecture
features.description: Enables faster load times and seamless gameplay.

features.title: Backward Compatibility
features.description: Play thousands of games across four generations.

features.title: Smart Delivery
features.description: Optimized versions of games automatically delivered to your console.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM4
products.description: Industry-leading noise-canceling headphones with intelligent features and long battery life.
highlights: Touch control for music and calls

features.title: Adaptive Sound Control
features.description: Automatically adjusts sound settings based on your surroundings.

features.title: Speak-to-Chat
features.description: Pauses music when you start speaking.

features.title: Quick Charge
features.description: 10 minutes of charge gives 5 hours of playback.

products.name: Nintendo Switch OLED Model
products.description: Enjoy vibrant colors and sharp contrast with the 7-inch OLED screen. Perfect for handheld and tabletop gaming.

features.title: Handheld & TV Mode
features.description: Switch seamlessly between handheld, tabletop, and TV modes.

features.title: Local Multiplayer
features.description: Enjoy local multiplayer gaming with friends and family.

features.title: Nintendo eShop
features.description: Access a wide library of games and downloadable content.

products.name: Logitech G Pro X Superlight
products.description: Ultra-lightweight wireless gaming mouse designed for esports professionals with HERO 25K sensor.

features.title: Pro-Grade Performance
features.description: Designed for competitive gaming with ultra-low latency.

features.title: Long Battery Life
features.description: 70 hours of non-stop gaming on a single charge.

features.title: Ultra-Lightweight
features.description: Weighs only 63g for smooth and precise movements.

products.name: Corsair K100 RGB Mechanical Keyboard
products.description: The most advanced Corsair mechanical gaming keyboard with OPX optical-mechanical switches and iCUE control.

features.title: OPX Optical Switches
features.description: Delivers lightning-fast actuation and ultra-smooth keystrokes.

features.title: Dedicated Media Controls
features.description: Easily manage your music and volume with a customizable iCUE wheel.

features.title: Aluminum Frame
features.description: Durable and premium build quality for long-term use.

products.name: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless
products.description: High-fidelity gaming headset with dual wireless, ANC, and Sonar Spatial Audio.

features.title: ANC & Transparency Mode
features.description: Block out noise or hear your surroundings with the click of a button.

features.title: Dual Wireless
features.description: Seamlessly switch between 2.4GHz gaming and Bluetooth for mobile use.

features.title: Sonar Spatial Audio
features.description: Experience 360-degree immersive sound with software enhancements.

products.name: ASUS ROG Strix RTX 4080
products.description: Next-generation gaming graphics card with AI-powered DLSS 3, ray tracing, and massive VRAM capacity.

features.title: Ray Tracing & DLSS 3

features.title: Advanced Cooling
